adrFormatAddress: 113 W 78th St Unit 1, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Rachel is incredible– our work together over the past 6 months has transformed my physical body, and my spiritual and emotional mind. My running has improved given greater mobility and alignment, and a deeper, more nourishing breath. Rachel was also able to open my sinuses and correct symptoms from a deviated septum and severe nasal congestion. Just today she eased restrictions that were making it difficult for me to take a full breath. I leave each session feeling like a new, more whole person, like I've just had an energetic tune up. Rachel is genuine, caring, and such a beautiful soul– so happy to have found her and Midtown PT!

originalText.text: I recently completed working with Shoshana on shoulder issues.   Through manual massage and exercises, Shoshana greatly helped me gain flexibility and upper back strength.  Equally important, I now have a better awareness of how my past upper body movements negatively impacted my shoulders and how to adjust the way I move during daily activities so I can continue to improve.   You get very personalized care at Midtown PT, with the physical therapist working with you for the entire appointment.

originalText.text: I had the good luck to work with Shoshana who guided me during  a bout of sciatica. A  consummate professional with thorough knowledge of anatomy she assesses the patient's ability to  gradually build up strength and endurance to achieve the goal.  The exercises Shoshana recommended to do at home certainly accelerated healing.  Most physical therapy settings are in large open spaces with therapists who work with several clients at once.  Midtown PT  is particularly attractive  and personal; a therapist works and concentrates with one patient at a time in a private space which makes engaging in awkward exercises comfortable.

originalText.text: This was my first time doing myofascial release and my results were incredible. I felt so much taller and looser immediately and my mobility significantly improved. The location is adorable and it’s not one of those practices where you can see all the patients from the street through windows. It’s very private and they even have private treatment rooms. The PTs at Midtown Physical Therapy are the sweetest people too!

originalText.text: I have been helped GREATLY by Midtown Physical Therapy both in the Manhattan and Riverdale studios.  Rachel Williams has put together a gifted group of therapists who employ a wide range of approaches and therapies, including powerful Myofascial Release. They listen and work hard to find solutions that go way beyond the usual PT.  And they’ve taught me many tools I can do myself. I recommend Midtown Pt highly.
